mapper.select: SELECT a.tsnum,a.tsautostepsname, a.tsfrontcase, a.tsexpected, a.tsverificationid, a.tsverificationcontent, a.tsdebug, a.tsgrade, a.tsregress,a.tssmoke, b.tsname, b.tssearchid, b.tssearchcontent, b.tsexecutionid, b.tsiframe, b.tswaittime FROM tsuitestcase as a, tsautosteps as b where find_in_set(b.tsname,a.tsautostepsname)
